selectDishesMessage: Please select dishes immediately for this date to allow the chef to prepare.
noAvailableTimeSlots: No available time slots for this day.
enterNoteForDish: Enter a note for this dish
repeatScheduleGuideDescription: The "Repeat Schedule" feature helps you automatically select booking dates that follow a repeating weekly pattern (e.g., every Monday, Tuesday) for packages of 10 days or more, saving you time from selecting each date manually.
repeatScheduleStep2: Select the weekdays (Sun, Mon, Tue, ...) you want to book regularly.
repeatScheduleStep3: Tap "Apply" to automatically choose matching dates starting from today, continuing until the total number of days in the package is reached ({selectedPackage?.durationDays} days).
repeatScheduleStep4: You can disable this feature anytime to manually select dates on the calendar.
expenseIncreased: Expense increased by {{amount}} compared to income
incomeIncreased: Income increased by {{amount}} compared to expense
enterFullName: Enter your first and last name
phoneIsValid: Phone number must have exactly 10 digits
contactDetails: Select which contact details should we use to reset your password
wehaveSentACodeToYourEmail: We have sent a code to your email
notEnoughBalance: Insufficient balance in the wallet. Please top up your wallet to continue
applicationFeeDescription:
The application fee is a small charge collected to help improve and maintain the app, ensuring you have the best chef booking experience.
We use this fee to upgrade features, maintain the system, and bring better services to you.
googleSignInFailed: Google sign-in failed. Please try again.

enter4digit: Please enter the 4-digit verification code that has been sent to the phone number
